Astapori ruling council024565bi1b95oncpcgg1irzd0kpdm7q3oi1ax1353642014-05-15T07:50:24Z193.44.1.83The '''Astapori ruling council''' is an organization established by [[Daenerys Targaryen]] to rule over the city of [[Astapor]] after [[Sack of Astapor|overthrowing]] the [[Good Masters]].

However, not long after Daenerys [[Siege of Meereen|conquers]] [[Meereen]], news arrive that the council has been overthrown by a man named [[Cleon]].<ref>"[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Daenerys leaves Astapor under the rule of a council of three men, a healer, a scholar and a priest. However, Cleon leads the people to believe that the three intend to return the Good Masters to power. Naming himself king after he has the council executed, he has all the highborn boys of the city seized to begin training new [[Unsullied]].
